name: recipe-cheatsheet
title: Pokemon Quest Cooking Recipes
description: Our mobile optimized cheat sheet has recipes for every type of Pokemon. Easy reference for elusive types like Electric, Psychic, Fighting and Water pokemon.

name: cooking-simulator
title: Pokemon Quest Cooking Simulator
description: Plug your ingredients into our cooking simulator and we'll predict what kind of pokemon it will create. We'll remember your recipe for next time so you know how you got your best pokemon.

name: index
title: Welcome to Pokemon Quest Guide
description: Learn everything about how to play the new Nintendo Switch Pokemon game. Tips for free to play strategy, cooking recipes, and more!
